item.description:
CT River Yoga - Free Event

Join me as I lead us in some early morning yoga on the CT River for July Fourth.  What a way to celebrate our Independence Day!  Most people have the day off, so show up and we will have an exhilarating time!  Please bring some breakfast if you wish so we can socialize a bit after. Please bring a blanket not a mat.

There is no better way to start your mornings then with a yoga practice at Harbor Park as the sun rises over the Conneticut River. Experience the meditative qualities of the rushing river coupled with gentle yoga focused on slow deep breathing and meditation.   Practicing yoga and meditating in the presence of the rising sun reinforces our connection to spirit, and it is the most benficial way for gaining energy. The rays of the morning sun emit 'qi energy' or 'prana' that is present in the air during sunrise. This energy is able to renew and transform us during our practice.

This is a partner event with Happy Healthy Mornings in Middletown...

http://www.meetup.com/Happy-Healthy-Mornings-in-Middletown/

Directions:

Route 9 South 
Take Exit 14 onto DeKoven Drive (toward Harbor Park)
Take 1st left onto Union Street
Turn left onto Harbor Drive
Drive past the Harbor Park restaurant
Park in the small lot right before the park area
item.how_to_find_us: meet in small parking lot before park
item.name: CT River Yoga
